tasks.task: Participate in a strawberry production season by managing various pests.
subtasks: Monitor and control cutworms using appropriate sprays.
Manage aphids throughout the season with pesticides and predatory mites.
Address spider mites by applying miticides and monitoring leaf stippling and chlorosis.
Combat sap beetles by using bait buckets near fields and maintaining proper harvesting practices.
Tackle thrips with organic and broad-spectrum insecticides, managing leaf darkening and fruit damage.
Implement strategies for Spotted Wing Drosophila (SWD) control, including chemical treatments, behavioral controls, and cultural practices.
Protect pollinators by minimizing pesticide exposure and supporting bee populations in the field.
Utilize resources such as the Southeast Small Fruit Consortium Guide and IPM app for effective strawberry pest management.
